entry.title: Featherlight Tote in Nordic Gray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 98.00

The essential everyday bag that weighs next to nothing but carries just about everything. Our Featherlight Tote is designed to keep your life organized and your shoulder happy, from daily commutes to international flights. Made from a soft-yet-durable fabric, it features a padded sleeve that fits a 16" laptop and travel-ready, easy-access pockets with spots for your passport, earbuds, or lip balm. Personal item-sized, with a trolley sleeve that slips effortlessly onto your suitcase, it's the lightweight tote you’ll reach for every day—and every trip.

entry.title: Beach Tote in Seaside Blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 125.00

Meet the Beach Tote: here to upgrade your beach day (or pool day, or sunset swim). Built to handle sun, salt, and sand with ease, it's your ultimate summer sidekick—durable, organized, and ready when spontaneity strikes.

Roomy enough for towels, snacks, sunscreen, and then some, the Beach Tote is made from breathable mesh and water-resistant fabric that dries fast, shakes off sand, and wipes clean. Six exterior pockets keep essentials like SPF, keys, beach reads, and sunglasses right where you need them, while a roomy interior zip pocket and dedicated water bottle pocket keep you organized—and hydrated. Plus, a top zipper closure keeps everything in place when the ocean calls. And because no one loves a sandy bag, front loops hold your towel, hat, or yoga mat. Carry it over your shoulder or by the handle; either way, when a beach day comes out of nowhere (as the best ones do), all you have to do is grab and go.

entry.title: Featherlight Diaper Tote in Jet Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 178.00

Designed with both baby and caretaker in mind (because you matter too) the Featherlight Diaper Tote helps lighten your load while keeping you organized and ready for anything: playdates, park hangs, pediatrician visits, or just escaping the house with your sanity intact. Inside, there's a spacious main compartment with smart storage: wipeable clear pockets for easy visibility (no one wants to dig for a pacifier in a panic), and two mesh bottle holders. The removable diaper caddy with pockets and a fold-out changing pad makes quick changes feel—dare we say it?—kind of easy. Outside are two more pockets for bottles, grab handles and shoulder straps, a zippered, padded sleeve to keep your laptop safe, a stroller clip for when your hands are full (always), and a trolley sleeve for more seamless travel.

entry.title: The Everywhere Tote in Coast Blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 155.00

Our versatile tote, featuring a top zipper to keep your belongings secure, carries everything you need for a museum date or a day at the office. Made with water-resistant nylon and leather trim, it fits up to a 16" laptop and secures to any Away suitcase for a seamless travel experience.

entry.title: Transit Canvas Tote in Transit Canvas Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 275.00

For quick trips or weekend getaways, the Transit Canvas Tote has got you covered. With a spacious main compartment and a wide top opening, packing is a breeze. The padded laptop sleeve fits up to a 16" device, while two side shoe compartments are perfect for stashing your most essential shoes like wedding heels, comfortable sneakers, or those slides you can’t travel without. Plus, the front zipper pocket keeps all your must-haves within reach.

Carry it over your shoulder with its leather straps or slide it over any Away suitcase with its trolley sleeve for those longer trips when needed. This travel essential fits into the overhead bins of most major US airlines, so no matter where life takes you, this tote is ready for the ride.

entry.title: The Double Diaper Tote in Olive Green
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 245.00

Introducing the Double Diaper Tote—your family’s ultimate plus one for every trip. Designed with larger, separate compartments for both you and your little one, this all-in-one travel bag ensures you have everything you need—and nothing you don’t.

The dedicated baby compartment offers easy access to diapers, bottles, and snacks, while your tech and personal items are securely organized in their own section. The wipeable, water-resistant bottom compartment ensures messes stay contained. Additional straps attach to industry-leading strollers, making navigating with your little one easier than ever. Perfect for parents on the go, the Double Diaper Tote grows with you, making it the only diaper bag you’ll ever need.

entry.title: Large Featherlight Tote in Amaro Brown
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 118.00

Designed to fit a lot, and with just enough support for anything you put inside, this large tote bag is highly organized and endlessly versatile. TSA stress is never a good look, which is why we included a travel-ready pocket sized to fit your passport, a 16" laptop sleeve, and an extra zipper pocket for anything else you don't want floating around. A hidden pocket located between the straps is perfect for earbuds, lip balm, or a credit card. Carry it by hand or on your shoulder—there are straps for both—or slip its trolley sleeve onto any Away suitcase and let it ride. It's a big lift for a light bag.

entry.title: Active Tote 45L in Forest Green
entry.summary:
Vendor: Away Travel
Type: Bags
Price: 60.00

Made from a lightweight, high-strength polyester, this versatile 45L Tote packs a day's worth of travel essentials. A top cinch closure adjusts to how much you pack, while an exterior and interior pocket system organizes your phone, passport, and other valuables within reach.

Made from 100% water repellent and abrasion-resistant Dual Action fabric, our Active Collection is designed to protect your belongings from the elements—whether you’re staying local or going off the grid.
